attributes.action: Rename ‘Kensington Palace Gardens’ in London as ‘Free Ukraine Gardens’
attributes.additional_details: This will demonstrate to Russia and Ukraine the British people’s support for a free, independent and peaceful Ukraine. It will also serve to further embarrass and remind Russian diplomat’s of the UK’s sentiments towards Putin’s actions in Ukraine.
attributes.background: The address of the Russian Embassy in London is 6/7 Kensington Palace Gardens. By renaming the street to “Free Ukraine Gardens” we can ensure that the business card of every Russian diplomat in London promotes a free Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
